casebody.data:
LOCKLEAR
v.
CUMMINGS, et al. 202A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2017 Walter L. Hart, IV, Attorney at Law, for Locklear, Marjorie C. David D. Ward, Attorney at Law, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cummings, Matthew S. (M.D.), et al. Robert A. Ford, Attorney at Law, Demetrius Worley Berry, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Katherine Hilkey-Boyatt, Attorney *424at Law, Raleigh, for Southeastern Regional Medical Center.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of June 2017 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of June 2017."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 21st day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
